name: Ninja Maze Run: Ancient Temple Runner!
name_original: Ninja Maze Run: Ancient Temple Runner!
description:
Ninja Maze Run : Ancient Temple Runner!
  • GENRE: 3D ARCADE
  • TYPE: INFINITY MAZE RUNNER
  • GRAPHICS: LOW-POLY / TOONY
  • THEME: ANCIENT ASIAN FANTASY
DOWNLOAD NOW ON: Microsoft Store Google Play Store Ultra Fun Games presents a new type of infinity runner with this hot new release: Ninja Maze Run : Ancient Temple Runner !

Experience the thrill, beat your high score or your friends’ high score and collect tokens to unlock all the 16 skins! Run through a large variety of maze-like citadels of ancient Asia to find the hidden tokens and reach the hidden city of Shamballa!

Experience:

  • Amazing Models, Level Design, Animation, Music, Sound and Colors!
  • New Type of Game Requiring Reaction Speed and Spatial Orientation Skills
  • Running and Jumping with a Ninja, Samurai, Geisha, Farmer, Sensei etc (16 skins)
  • Super Powers if you Collect or Buy Tokens
  • Running through Wonderful Towns, Cities and Temples
  • An Ultra Fun Casual Game with a Plot!

You need to collect as many tokens as you can! Some are visible, but most of them are hidden! Avoid all obstacles cause they will cost you health points! The tokens will increase your Health Points or Mana Shield, as they contain great energy inside them! Your score will increase while you pass a maze, and after certain score points, your jumping power will increase as well!

Be one of the first ninja runners in the first official release of Ninja Maze Run : Ancient Temple Runner !
